WorkItem.Description:
I just downloaded Rawr 2.1.9 and I have never had issues with Rawr before (2.1.8 still runs just fine) but I get the following error message when I try to open 2.1.9.  I first got the error after opening 2.1.9 once and then I chose to load my character from the Armory.  I then received an error box that asked me if I wanted to close the program or try to ignore the error.  I chose to close and attempted to reopen which is where I am stuck at now.
Â 
I can't copy and paste like the error suggests but I can take a screenshot of it!

Comments.Message: Hey. Sorry about that error; we fixed it and reposted 2.1.9, but a few people (yourself included) got it before we fixed it. Just re-download 2.1.9, and it'll be fixed. You'll know you have the right version if it says DPSDK 2.1.9.1 on the splash screen.
It appears to be working flawlessly now.  Thank you!
